keyword: how many calories is in string cheese
title: How Many Calories in String Cheese?
meta_description: Learn how many calories is in string cheese with a full nutrition breakdown, including protein, fat, carbs, and quick tips for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in String Cheese?
assumptions: Standard 1 oz (28g) mozzarella string cheese stick, pasteurized, no added flavors.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, milk type, and processing; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One string cheese stick contains about 80 kcal and 7 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp nuts for crunch per stick
Whole milk vs. part-skim per stick

faqs.q: How many calories is in one string cheese?
faqs.a: Approximately 80 kcal per standard 1 oz stick.

faqs.q: What's the protein in string cheese?
faqs.a: About 7 g protein per stick, making it a good snack.
Very low at 1 g carbs per stick, with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: How much fat is in string cheese?
faqs.a: Around 6 g total fat, including 4 g saturated fat per stick.

faqs.q: Is string cheese high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 200 mg sodium per stick; opt for low-sodium varieties if needed.
